extendedInfo.description: Designed specially for people who love fire or smoke and also the blue, green, orange and red colors or yellow, purple color.GO SMS Theme Color Smoke works only with GO SMS Pro application, if you don't have it, download for free from Google Play.This a new skin for GO SMS Pro Theme = smoke rainbow, fire theme is theme designed specially for people who like the fire and smoke, weed, ganja and marihuana.Do you love colorful smoke or ganja or weed? Like blunts/blunt, joint or water bong? If yes, it is application for you! And it's for free! This Go Theme have a three great high resolution HD wallpapers for main background, and great colorful icons.This a new skin for GO SMS Pro, theme was created for this android users, who likes themes related with rasta style and smoking weed and joint or fag. This GO Theme have a  great high resolution HD reagge and reggae wallpaper for main background, and great green icons.If you like green, pink, red and blue or violet colors, you are rasta, or rastafari, try this free theme with epic wallpaper and icons include in this GOSMS Pro theme.This theme is for every rastaman on green planet. In this project we have presented our vision of green ganja and weed or cigarette world. Install it and you will follow of love to the grass. Feel and see how marihuana looks live in colorful colors.Style helps You to customization and personalization your GO SMS Pro with great stuff , and that all for FREE!To apply the theme[also for GO Chat]:1. Download GO SMS Pro Theme Smoke Fire color from Google Play for free2. Download GO SMS Pro for free3. Install and launch GO SMS app3. Press right to see options and press"theme4. Press "Installed" tab 5. Tap the GO SMS Theme Color SmokeRemember that marijuana is a narcotic in most countries!If you like green color, you are rasta, or rastafari, try this free theme. great wallpaper and icons include in this gosmspro them.Smoke was modeled on the smoke from the fire.  Try now this green, yellow and red, orange theme with white and grey smoke and tons customization options.Feel like a real rastaman with rasta phone, be happy every time when you post a sms message!Smoke is a symbol of  the king lion of peace and mary jane from Jamaica - reagge or reggae style.To change apperance settings about conversation list1. Press Menu 2. Press Adwanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation List CustomizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:- Background in messages.- Displayed contact pictures.- Contact font.- Contact font color.- Time and message fonts.- Or restet this setting as to default.To change apperance settings about conversation style1. Press  Menu 2. Press Adwanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation customizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:Conversation style ( bubble setting or list style)- Background- Incoming font- Outgoing font- Hyperlink color in textIf you want to use avatar icon for any contact simply change it and the new image for each contacts are visible on conversation list and messages sms list.Disclaimer: To support making of our themes and releasing it for free, this application periodically presents advertisements in your notification bar. The permissions are for advertising. This app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore it or delete it. Thank you.Check other our GOSMSPro, GO Locker and GO Launcher EX, free themes.Themes are published all the time, so remember to check our developer account regularly.Style was created by WorkshopTheme

reviews.title: Great!

reviews.title: Ehhhh
reviews.comment: Its okay I guess....it sucks that you have to rate it first so it\'s kind of a pain but its cute and lots of options!

reviews.title: Could be. Better
reviews.comment: Don\'t like the fact that you have to rate and like on order to even use the theme. Other than that it\'s ok

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: I mean its ok for the most part but like most of the comments say you do have to rate it and go through google services and lots of pop ups
reviews.author: Izzamatic Lamon

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: I like the way it looks like the colors in the smoke on the way it seems but maybe it\'ll look more HD
reviews.author: Antonio Isais

reviews.title: This app forces unwanted things on your phone!!!!
reviews.comment: PLEASE READ! Before you can even open this they make you rate it. And no you do not have a choice! Then there is this option of not having lots of ads pop up by installing an app- as soon as the app was installed notifications of advertises started to pop up! I wish I could rate this half of a star the only reason they would get half would be for the pretty app! But it is not worth downloading! This needs to be fixed because this app is a waste of time! people do not waste any of your time installing!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Charmion Bell

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: A bunch of pop ups instantly,  you have to rate before you even install.. not worth it
reviews.author: Janet Sweet
